overview: Brian Jacolick is committed to simplifying solar for leading organizations, by overseeing all SunEdison financial and operational performance and teams throughout the U.S., Canada and the Caribbean. Under Jacolick’s leadership as Vice President of Sales, SunEdison developed and deployed innovative, multi-installation solar programs for marquee organizations including Kohl’s, Staples, Wal-Mart, Walgreens and the State of California. With extensive experience that crosses hands-on installation, finance, engineering, operations and sales, Jacolick champions the seamless and efficient integration of solar energy services for every customer.
